title: question about rewards regarding flex
body: if im silver in solo but bronze in flex will i need to get silver in flex the receive the silver rewards or does it not matter?

replies.body:
Aim high Cheesyleeks !

Get that gold border :) I believe in you !
Thats the goal but the doubt is strong XD
You will get a silver border when you play any queue except flex next season. The border you have in regular non ranked games is the highest one from any ranked queue.
